metadata.title: CVE-2019-14888 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in the Undertow HTTP server in versions before2.0.28.SP1 when listening on HTTPS. An attacker can target the HTTPS portto carry out a Denial Of Service (DOS) to make the service unavailable onSSL.

criterions.comment: undertow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
